definition: leave of absence for a personal matter

sentences.english: Wish one heart person, the hoary head not and mutually leave.
sentences.chinese: 祝願一個心臟人，古老的頭沒有和相互事假。

sentences.english: You'll need to apply for your personal leave at least a month in advance.
sentences.chinese: 如果要請事假，必須在一個月以前提出申請。

sentences.english: Total personal leave is less than 6 working days, or considered to be absent from work.
sentences.chinese: 每年的事假天數不得超過6個工作日，否則視爲曠工。

sentences.english: He is absent on business. About three months' leave.
sentences.chinese: 他請事假了，大約三個月的假期。

sentences.english: I hope that my absence will not cause you too much inconvenience.
sentences.chinese: 希望我的事假不會給您帶來很大不便。

sentences.english: I need a personal leave for tow days.

definition: official leave from work (e.g. maternity leave, sick leave or leave to attend to official business)
to shift holidays, taking a weekday off
to be absent from work or school
to receive one's regular salary (while on vacation, study leave etc)/paid (leave)/on full pay
to take deferred time off (to make up for working during the weekend or holidays)/compensatory leave
